But those pieces of legislation alone are not sufficient to prevent the next attempt to overturn the will of the voters.

1479104715161956359.text: The Big Lie has been used as pretext all over the country for rampant efforts to suppress the ability to vote, to install election officials willing to openly ignore the legal votes of the people, and to enact other mechanisms to overturn the results of future elections.

1479104300089364482.text: Sadly, the threat to our Democracy is ongoing. Adherence to the former president’s ‘Big Lie’ about the 2020 election is now the most important litmus test for my colleagues on the other side of the aisle.

1479104178723065866.text: While we were not deterred from fulfilling our constitutional duty, it still concerns me that just hours after this violent insurrection so many of my colleagues – 147 to be exact –voted to overturn the legally cast votes of millions of our fellow Americans.

1479104080102313984.text: The Capitol Police force was overwhelmed. Members of Congress, congressional staff, reporters, and support personnel were forced to hide from the violent mob storming and ransacking our Capitol. Several individuals lost their lives, including multiple police officers.

1231997656530128901.text: Mrs. Johnson was a true American hero, and we were so proud to have her call Hampton Roads home. I want to send my deepest condolences to her family and friends, and to everyone who was inspired by her remarkable life and work.

1231997398878183424.text: While I knew Mrs. Johnson for many years, I never fully appreciated the work that she, Dorothy Vaughn, Mary Jackson, Christine Darden and the many other African American women at NASA trailblazed for so many until their untold story was revealed in @HiddenFigures.

1231995808129671175.text: Her work helped put the first Americans in space and send the Apollo 11 astronauts to the moon, thereby helping the United States win the Space Race.

1231995541212540928.text: It is with deep sadness that I learned of the passing of Katherine Johnson, a truly brilliant mathematician and pioneer.
